about.title: According to my friends, I am:
about.qualities1: A friendly communicator - I easily connect with others and create a positive atmosphere in any team.
about.qualities2: A responsible achiever - I always keep my word and follow through on every task I take on.
about.qualities3: Hardworking and result-oriented - I'm fully committed to reaching goals and delivering high-quality results.
